verses.verse: Whoever <S%H157>loves<s%> <S%H4148>instruction<s%> <S%H157>loves<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge:<s%> but he that <S%H8130>hates<s%> <S%H8433>reproof<s%> is <S%H1197>brutish.<s%>
A <S%H2896>good<s%> man <S%H6329>obtains<s%> <S%H7522>favor<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> but a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H4209>wicked<s%> <S%H4209>devices<s%> will he <S%H7561>condemn.<s%>
A <S%H120>man<s%> shall not be <S%H3559>established<s%> by <S%H7562>wickedness:<s%> but the <S%H8328>root<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall not be <S%H4131>moved.<s%>
A <S%H2428>virtuous<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> is a <S%H5850>crown<s%> to her <S%H1167>husband:<s%> but she that makes <S%H954>ashamed<s%> is as <S%H7538>rottenness<s%> in his <S%H6106>bones.<s%>
The <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> are <S%H4941>right:<s%> but the <S%H8458>counsels<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> are <S%H4820>deceit.<s%>
The <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> are to lie in <S%H693>wait<s%> for <S%H1818>blood:<s%> but the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H3477>upright<s%> shall <S%H5337>deliver<s%> them.
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> are <S%H2015>overthrown,<s%> and are not: but the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall <S%H5975>stand.<s%>
A <S%H376>man<s%> shall be <S%H1984>commended<s%> <S%H6310>according<s%> to his <S%H7922>wisdom:<s%> but he that is of a <S%H5753>perverse<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> shall be <S%H937>despised.<s%>
He that is <S%H7034>despised,<s%> and has a <S%H5650>servant,<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> than he that <S%H3513>honors<s%> himself, and <S%H2638>lacks<s%> <S%H3899>bread.<s%>
A <S%H6662>righteous<s%> man <S%H3045>regards<s%> the <S%H5315>life<s%> of his <S%H929>beast:<s%> but the tender <S%H7356>mercies<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> are <S%H394>cruel.<s%>

He that <S%H5647>tills<s%> his <S%H127>land<s%> shall be <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> with <S%H3899>bread:<s%> but he that <S%H7291>follows<s%> <S%H7386>vain<s%> persons is <S%H2638>void<s%> of <S%H3820>understanding.<s%>
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H2530>desires<s%> the <S%H4686>net<s%> of <S%H7451>evil<s%> men: but the <S%H8328>root<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H5414>yields<s%> fruit.
The <S%H7451>wicked<s%> is <S%H4170>snared<s%> by the <S%H6588>transgression<s%> of his <S%H8193>lips:<s%> but the <S%H6662>just<s%> shall <S%H3318>come<s%> out of <S%H6869>trouble.<s%>

A <S%H376>man<s%> shall be <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> with <S%H2896>good<s%> by the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of his <S%H6310>mouth:<s%> and the <S%H1576>recompense<s%> of a <S%H120>man's<s%> <S%H3027>hands<s%> shall be <S%H7725>rendered<s%> to him.
The <S%H1870>way<s%> of a <S%H191>fool<s%> is <S%H3477>right<s%> in his own <S%H5869>eyes:<s%> but he that <S%H8085>listens<s%> to <S%H6098>counsel<s%> is <S%H2450>wise.<s%>
A <S%H191>fool's<s%> <S%H3708>wrath<s%> is <S%H3117>presently<s%> <S%H3045>known:<s%> but a <S%H6175>prudent<s%> man <S%H3680>covers<s%> <S%H7036>shame.<s%>
He that <S%H6315>speaks<s%> <S%H530>truth<s%> <S%H5046>shows<s%> forth <S%H6664>righteousness:<s%> but a <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> <S%H4820>deceit.<s%>
There is that <S%H981>speaks<s%> like the <S%H4094>piercings<s%> of a <S%H2719>sword:<s%> but the <S%H3956>tongue<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise<s%> is <S%H4832>health.<s%>
The <S%H8193>lip<s%> of <S%H571>truth<s%> shall be <S%H3559>established<s%> for <S%H5703>ever:<s%> but a <S%H8367>lying<s%> <S%H3956>tongue<s%> is but for a <S%H7281>moment.<s%>
<S%H4820>Deceit<s%> is in the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of them that <S%H2790>imagine<s%> <S%H7451>evil:<s%> but to the <S%H3289>counsellors<s%> of <S%H7965>peace<s%> is <S%H8057>joy.<s%>
There shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H205>evil<s%> <S%H579>happen<s%> to the <S%H6662>just:<s%> but the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall be <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H7451>mischief.<s%>
<S%H8367>Lying<s%> <S%H8193>lips<s%> are <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> but they that <S%H6213>deal<s%> <S%H530>truly<s%> are his <S%H7522>delight.<s%>
A <S%H6175>prudent<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H3680>conceals<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge:<s%> but the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of <S%H3684>fools<s%> <S%H7121>proclaims<s%> <S%H200>foolishness.<s%>
The <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H2742>diligent<s%> shall <S%H4910>bear<s%> <S%H4910>rule:<s%> but the <S%H7423>slothful<s%> shall be under <S%H4522>tribute.<s%>
<S%H1674>Heaviness<s%> in the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of <S%H376>man<s%> makes it <S%H7812>stoop:<s%> but a <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> makes it <S%H8056>glad.<s%>
The <S%H6662>righteous<s%> is more <S%H8446>excellent<s%> than his <S%H7453>neighbor:<s%> but the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H8582>seduces<s%> them.
The <S%H7423>slothful<s%> man <S%H2760>roasts<s%> not that which he took in <S%H6718>hunting:<s%> but the <S%H1952>substance<s%> of a <S%H2742>diligent<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> is <S%H3368>precious.<s%>
In the <S%H734>way<s%> of <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> is <S%H2416>life:<s%> and in the <S%H1870>pathway<s%> <S%H5410><s%> thereof there is <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H4194>death.<s%>
